trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMKDTRANSPOINT_00924_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>You have attuned yourself to an Aethernet shard and now have access to the isle's Aethernet.
TEXT_CTSMKDTRANSPOINT_00924_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Additional shards can be found across the Occult Crescent. Attune to them to facilitate faster travel throughout the island.
